sentence.Network_en: Berg tilts his head and a mischievous look crosses his face.
sentence.Network_cn: 伯格侧着头，脸上掠过一丝调皮的神情。

sentence.Network_en: Margaret was always mischievous and set on her own individual course.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛格丽特总是调皮捣乱，而且一意孤行。

sentence.Network_en: She rocks back and forth on her chair like a mischievous child.
sentence.Network_cn: 她像个顽皮的孩子似的，坐在椅子上来回摇晃。

list.abs: Dido : a mischievous prank or antic ; a caper .胡闹：一种调皮的恶作剧或胡闹；
Discovering this , the mischievous boy wrote Meg a passionate love - letter purporting to be from Brooke ., 劳里这个淘气的孩子 , 发现了这个秘密 , 就以布鲁克的名义给梅格写了一封热情洋溢的情书.
1-6-5&nbsp;&nbsp;boy扩展的英语单词... ... little boy 小男孩 mischievous boy 调皮的男孩 nice boy 可爱的男孩.
The showman took pity on the mischievous puppet and let him go ., 团主同情这顽皮的木偶并放他走.

a supernatural creature of Scandinavian folklore , variously portrayed as a friendly or mischievous dwarf or as a giant , that lives in caves , in the hills , or under bridges巨人，巨怪斯堪的那维亚民间传说中的超自然的生物，时而被描述成友好的或顽皮的侏儒，时而被描述成巨人，居住在山洞里、小山上或桥下

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French meschevous, from Old French meschever 'come to an unfortunate end' (see mischief). The early sense was 'unfortunate or calamitous', later 'having harmful effects'; the sense 'playfully troublesome' dates from the late 17th cent

entry.tran: 调皮的;淘气的;恶作剧的
entry.def: A mischievous person likes to have fun by playing harmless tricks on people or doing things they are not supposed to do.

example.ex: She rocks back and forth on her chair like a mischievous child...
example.tran: 她像个顽皮的孩子似的，坐在椅子上来回摇晃。

entry.tran: 恶意的;不友善的;捣乱的
entry.def: A mischievous act or suggestion is intended to cause  trouble.

example.ex: ...a mischievous campaign by the press to divide the ANC...
example.tran: 媒体恶意分裂非洲国民大会的运动

example.ex: The Foreign Office dismissed the story as mischievous and false.
example.tran: 外交部驳斥该报道为恶意报道，不符合事实。

sentences.sentence: "he was saucy and mischievous in school"

sentences.en: He was saucy and mischievous when he was working.
sentences.cn: 他工作时总爱调皮捣蛋。
